intro: On the same day we commemorate the Holy Prophet Nahum.
On the same day we commemorate Saint Philaret the Merciful.
On the same day we commemorate the Holy Martyr Ananias the Persian.
On the same day we commemorate Saint Anthony the New.
On the same day Saint Onesimus, Archbishop of Ephesus, fell asleep in peace.
On the same day we commemorate our holy father Theokletos, Archbishop of Lacedaemon.

who: Saints Ananias and Solomon, Archbishops of Ephesus
intro: On the same day we commemorate our holy fathers Ananias and Solomon, Archbishops of Ephesus.
